content: **drops boa in snow puddel and vienna** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** approx 150 cm **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 50g colour no 01 off-white and use drops puddel from garnstudio 50g colour no 01 off-white and use drops vienna from garnstudio 50g colour no 21 off-white *hand-crocheted without a hook - scarf is made by winding yarn around a card *
